mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dataList (datalist_id, resource_id, resource_name, datalist_date, breed_id) VALUES (#{datalist_id}, #{resource_id}, #{resource_name}, #{datalist_date}, #{breed_id})
mapper.select: SELECT resource_name, datalist_date, COUNT(breed_id) AS cnt FROM dataList WHERE resource_id = #{resource_id} AND resource_name = #{resource_name} GROUP BY datalist_date

SELECT breed_id FROM dataList WHERE datalist_date = #{datalist_date} AND resource_name = #{resource_name} AND resource_id = #{resource_id} AND breed_id in (SELECT breed_id FROM breed WHERE row_file = 1)
SELECT COUNT(breed_id) FROM dataList WHERE datalist_date = #{datalist_date}
